msbt.message: The Fishing Tourney's gonna start soon, !I've been secretly preparing for MONTHS! I've even invented a special move just for today!Ready for it? OK, watch<10_4 /> C'mere, fishy!<10_4 /> Pretty great, yeah, ?
I can't wait for today's Fishing Tourney!As my greatest rival, you're the only angler I'm worried about!Everybody else can already consider themselves caught, !
The Fishing Tourney starts at nine o'clock today, .I've been working on my fishing muscles lately, so I'm gonna catch every fish there is!
Catch anything?<10_4 /> I know you'll be serious competition. You are MY rival, after all, !
I'm fishing as hard as I know how!My special move's really paying off. I walk up to the water and say "C'mere, fishy!"<10_4 /> Works every time!
Today's the day when we battle it out against the fish! Mano-a-Fisho! Bring your A game, !
My arms are rock hard from swinging that fishing rod around all day!Heh heh, no doubt I'll be sore tomorrow, but I'll have a trophy too, !
Who caught the most fish?Well, I think the most important thing is that everybody had fun!
Today I used a lot of my muscles. My arm muscles! My leg muscles! My fishing muscles! A LOT of muscles!Now my hungry muscles are really flexing! I gotta have a protein drink when I get home, !
How ya feelin', ?Me? Ha ha, I feel like I'm just getting started, .

! Listen to me! As soon as you give up? It's over!It's as true of fishing tournaments as it is of sandwich making! Don't quit! Don't leave mustard on the counter!The winner?! They're the one who is persistent until the end! The one who finishes their sandwich!Also? I think I'm hungry.
Fishing rods are hard to use, don't you think? You never know when the fish are going to bite!I think maybe I'll try grabbing 'em with my hands, .

Listen up! FISHING is a BATTLE! A battlewith a FISH! EVERYTHING is on the line, !There're only two possible outcomes! VICTORY! And the musty, gross cheese taste of defeat!So look right in that water! Square your shoulders! And say "C'mere, fishy."
